snippet: In his first remarks to the news media since seeking treatment, Yankees pitcher C. C. Sabathia said he first realized three years ago that he was an alcoholic.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher C C Sabathia addresses news media for first time since seeking treatment for alcohol abuse.
lead_paragraph: In his first remarks to the news media since seeking treatment, Yankees pitcher C. C. Sabathia said he first realized three years ago that he was an alcoholic.
